answers.answer_text: Answers related to plant cell structure identification and function.

sub_answers.text:
A: chloroplast ; photosynthesis / light energy to chemical energy / make glucose / make starch ;
B: (sap) vacuole ; storage / turgor / support
sub_answers.marking_notes:
Structure A: 1 mark for name, 1 mark for function.
Structure B: 1 mark for name, 1 mark for function.
Max 1 mark. Accept plant cell structures not on syllabus e.g. rough ER, Golgi apparatus etc.
